title: Burger King to roll out Marfrig veggie burgers nationwide in Brazil in Nov - Nasdaq.com
text: SAO PAULO, Sept 3 (Reuters) - Burger King restaurants in Brazil will begin selling plant-based burgers developed by meatpacker Marfrig Global Foods SA  in Sao Paulo city on Sept. 10, with a country-wide launch set for November, Marfrig said in a statement on Tuesday.
